name: Deathchase VR
description:
If the above game doesn't work, try https://stevesmith16384.bitbucket.io/deathchasevr/DeathchaseVR.html instead.   I don't think Itch properly handles WebXR pages.

Finally you can experience the adrenaline rush that is Deathchase in VR.  Based on the classic ZX Spectrum game (voted #1 in the last issue of Your Sinclair) you can race through thr forest shooting enemy bikers, tanks and helicopters.

This game is created in WebXR so it should work on any headset.  The only controls are pointing your controller to turn left and right, and press the button to accelerate and shoot.

Note that it seems to take about 20 seconds to "get going" once the game appears, so please be patient. 

If you have any problems let me know.
